text:
Pre-print RCT: #HCQ or #Chloroquine in hosp pts w/ moderate #COVID19

“Time to reach viral RNA negativity significantly faster in CLQ (p=0.006) & #HCQ (p=0.010) groups than in control group”

CLQ & HCQ had shorter time to clinical recovery than control

▶️https://t.co/41p0dvfTVW https://t.co/fQB2CnAdvs
